Des00.text:
OK... Time to go.
(Press space to continue)

Des0.text: Doesn't sound like a good idea...

Des3.text: Posters and drawings of badass elves and androids. Inspiring.

Des31.text: This good friend will not be your sidekick for today's adventure, but will happily welcome you when this awful day is over.

Des4.text: This plant is possibly the most beautiful living being in your house.

Des5.text: Time to take a break and breathe.

Des6.text: An old radio frequently used by your mum to spread awful music in the air.

Des61.text: You know, it will be a day like every other. You'll be fine...

Des7.text: Oh, ask your brother to give you some money for today. Please don't skip lunch!

Des8.text: A convenient and regular trash can.

Des9.text: What the...?! What are you doing here???

Des10.text: I already told Mum you were such a sneaky rat. She's waiting for you. Go now.

Des12.text: You're relieved this music garbage is over.

Des13.text: I HATE YOU SO MUCH I HATE YOU SO MUCH I HATE YOU SO MUCH I HATE YOU SO MUCH

Des14.text: You just fed Doudou the cat and he's happy. This cuddling and playing time gives you strength.

Dial12.text: Your phone. Hard to know if it causes or solves problems.

Dial13.text: Your favorite book. Imaginary worlds are much sweeter.

Dial14.text: Seems like pretty mature content... Should you read it?

CC1.text: Pfff... If you keep ignoring people, you won't make any friends, you know

AA1.text: Wow... Feels weird when you're confident like that.

Dial1.text: Ah ah, you're finally awake?! You look terrible. I can't believe you're going to college already. You still look like a child to me... and to everyone else! Ah ah!

possible_reponses.text: *smiling* Oh, I'm so happy to finally grow up and meet new adult friends!'

CC2.text: You're not awake yet, are you? Let's hear some music then.

AA2.text: Thanks! I'm happy we both love good music.

BB2.text: Fine, let's spend some time staring at each other quietly...

Dial2.text: Hello! It's nice we have some time together before your big day! Such a big day. You don't mind if I turn on the radio, do you?

CC3.text: Nice, just ignore your poor mother.

AA3.text: Well, sit with me, my love.

BB3.text: Fine, I don't take it personnally.

Dial3.text: Oh yes, I was keeping this chocolate bar for you. Eat it now while having a little chat with your mum.

possible_reponses.text: No mum, I'm saving it for later today.

BB4.text: It's brave to admit it. And you SHOULD be scared. You can be so "different" sometimes.

DD4.text: Ah ah, that's my child... my good child...

Dial4.text: So... How do you feel about today?

possible_reponses.text: I don't wanna talk about it.
*winking* It should be totally ok! Looking forward to it!

CC5.text: I don't even know why I'm expecting a reaction from you.

AA5.next: You know I'm telling the truth. You are disrespectful and you KNOW it.

BB5.text: And I love you too, honey. So much...

Dial5.text: Sometimes I wonder why you can consider that no answer is an answer. Really disrespectful.

possible_reponses.text: I admit I should work on this, mum. You know I love you though.

AA6.text: Ah ah yes, don't do anything stupid with it...And you should think about a part-time job to be less dependent on others.

BB6.text: F*ck, really?! I'll have a look.

possible_reponses.text: Mum told me you have some money for me...
I heard a strange noise outside... It might be the cat. Could you check please?

CC7.text: Stop staring at me like this!!! Weirdo! Get out!!

AA7.text: Nice, now get out of here.

Dial7.text: You're such a sneaky little brat!! Give this magazine back to me right now!!!

possible_reponses.text: If you want me not to tell mum, you really should stop this.

AA8.text: I wanna hear from you today. We should call each other during your lunch break! And be kind to people and avoid strangers.

BB8.text: This is really stupid. You should really consider taking it with you.

Dial8.text: Oh, something else! Promise me you don't leave your phone here!

possible_reponses.text: Yes, I have it, don't worry...
I... really prefer to leave it here, mum...

AA9.text: Why should I stop??? This is my house!!!

BB9.text: Why should I stop??? This is my house!!!

Dial9.text: What are you still doing here???

CC10.text: AND YOU'RE STILL SILENT!!!! GOD YOU ARE SO DUMB!!!!!!

AA10.text: OH I THINK IT, YOU LITTLE SH*T!!!!!

Dial10.text: YOU ARE AN UNGRATEFUL CHILD AND I REGRET HAVING SUCH A BURDEN IN MY LIFE!

possible_reponses.text: Please stop it... Tell me you don't think that...
Let's breathe. I'm cool. Everything's ok.

AA11.text: AH AH AH AH AH DON'T PRETEND TO BE BRAVE!!!

Dial11.text: YOU CANNOT BE SOMETHING ELSE THAN A RAT!!! YOU SHOULD JUST STOP BEING!!!!

possible_reponses.text: You really think you impress me with such bullsh*t?
